metadata.name: x {$tolen|$treet:$ign|$eries} x Pagoda x 1
metadata.description:
Constructed in 1908 and perched upon the edge of a cliff over looking the city, this magnificent structure contains a tocsin bell cast in Obata Japan, 1739.

Engraved in Japanese characters upon the bell is a true and accurate prophecy depicting the end of time.

The Pagoda is located atop the Mount Penn Preserve; opposite the Witches Hat on Neversink Mountain.

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/the-reading-pagoda-reading-pennsylvania

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/witchs-hat-pavilion

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pagoda_(Reading,_Pennsylvania)
